info.description: Demo AI endpoints for Postman: health, complete (Groq/Llama), summarize and sentiment (Hugging Face). Works in demo mode without API keys.

request.description: Health and capability check. Shows demo vs live and which providers (Groq, Hugging Face) are configured.
Chat completion. Uses Groq (Llama) when Ai:GroqApiKey is set; otherwise returns demo response.
Summarize text with Hugging Face BART. Demo mode when Ai:HuggingFaceToken is not set.
Sentiment analysis. Returns label and score. Demo mode when Hugging Face token is not set.
